meanings.sent1: The supermarket sells precooked meals that only need to be reheated.
meanings.sent2: I bought a precooked pizza for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The precooked chicken was so convenient, I didn't have to spend time cooking it.
meanings.sent4: Her precooked explanation made the topic easier to understand.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the precooked bacon filled the kitchen with a delicious aroma.

meanings.sent1: I always precook the pasta before making the sauce.
meanings.sent2: She precooked the vegetables for the stir-fry.
meanings.sent3: He tried to precook the eggs, but they ended up overcooked.
meanings.sent4: The chef decided to precook the meat to save time during the rush.
meanings.sent5: Precooking the rice helps to speed up the dinner preparation process.
